data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Lajas, Puerto Rico from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lajas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Lajas, Puerto Rico to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 7,185 believers in the state of Lajas the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 7,185 believers in Lajas against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Palmarejo
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Palmarejo, Lajas, Puerto Rico.
Lord we pray you unite the 7,185 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Lajas.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Lajas words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Lajas who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
